short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Logical analysis of web content using Google's Gemini API

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use Google Gemini to analyze articles for factual and logical accuracy. The code is open source under the MIT license at https://github.com/Ovid/chrome-diogenes

Requires an API key you can get at https://ai.google.dev/
